name: stream-deck
description: Stream Deck MCP plugin - control Stream Deck devices, get installed plugins, and execute actions

functions.name: streamdeck_call
functions.description: PRIMARY command for ALL Stream Deck operations. Automatically initializes session. Use tool='get_devices' to list devices, 'get_plugins' for plugins, 'get_executable_actions' for available actions, or 'execute_action' to run an action.

tool.description: The MCP tool to call: 'get_devices', 'get_plugins', 'get_executable_actions', 'execute_action', or 'install_plugin'

arguments.description: Optional JSON string of arguments for the tool

functions.name: streamdeck_discover
functions.description: List what Stream Deck tools are available from the MCP server. Only use this if you need to see the full list of available operations.
